The correct order is: 1 -> 2 -> 3 -> 4 -> 5 -> 6
Option B best fits the sequence of events based on the audio description provided. The first event is the speaker's introduction, which starts with the screen displaying the TEDx logo and the presenter's name. This is followed by on-screen text mentioning the date and location. Then, the speaker reminisces about a specific time period, which leads him to mention his involvement with drugs and his legal troubles. Finally, the audio ends with quiet music and credits rolling, including information about the Silver Squirrel Foundation.

The correct order is: 1 - On-screen text appears over red background while he begins speaking. 2 - A black screen with white text appears, showing biography details about Stratton's past. 3 - stratton recounts how marijuana was called 'a weed with roots in hell' during the Reefer Madness era. 4 - stratton then talks about his experience with legalization and starting High Times magazine. 5 - stratton then recounts his time in prison, including his mandatory life sentence under the Kingpin statute. 6 - stratton then discusses the issue of mass incarceration and the closure of rehabilitation programs in prisons. 7 - stratton finishes by saying that he started Prison Life Magazine, which was written by inmates and helped him become an activist and expert witness.

Therefore, the correct order is option C: 1 -> 2 -> 3 -> 4 -> 5 -> 6 -> 7.
